text: @gtconway3d At 1 of the first coronavirus briefings, Feb. 26, the pres. said the country’s 15 cases of infection would soon be zero, given that “pretty good job we’ve done.” Today deaths are approaching 100,000. Due to trump’s inaction, what began as Covid19 is now the President’s PANDEMIC
